channel.title: Posts on Rimworld Multiplayer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Rimworld Multiplayer

item.title: Update 0.5.0 | 1.1 and Royalty Patch
item.description: Sorry for the radio silence and lack of updates. The 1.1 update together with Royalty compatibility was a pretty tricky patch, as the update broke a lot of stuff and even now we’re still finding new things that need syncing/fixing. Anyway our “stable” build will be uploaded to Steam sometime after this blog post is posted, so have fun and report ANYTHING WRONG in our discord so we can fix it.

item.title: Website Online
item.description: We have a sorta-functional website now. Hoorah. Many thanks to PJB, who suffered my many questions and Silver who helped me get things working in Cloudflare.

item.title: Update 0.4.8.3 | API Update/Hotfix
item.description: 0.4.8.3 caused some issues with the research window not closing. We fixed it.

item.title: Update 0.4.8 | API Release
item.description: NotFood made an API, and patched a whole load of mods in the process.

item.title: Update 0.4.7 | Emergency Hotfix
item.description: Rimworld 1.0.2282 broke the Multiplayer Mod. We fixed it.

item.title: Update 0.4.6 | Steam Workshop Release
item.description: Rimworld Multiplayer has been released on Steam.

item.title: Update 0.4.5 | New Developers
item.description: Zetrith has disappeared. He ceased communication in February, his last github commit was on February 2nd, and his last forum activity was February 27th. Members of the community have stepped forward to continue development of the mod.
